descriptions: No textual evidence is cited or the evidence is completely irrelevant to the analysis.
Textual evidence is either missing or vaguely related to the analysis.
Some textual evidence is provided, but it is weakly connected to the analysis.
Relevant textual evidence is provided to support the analysis.
Well-chosen textual evidence is provided to effectively support the analysis, demonstrating a clear understanding of the text.
Textual evidence is skillfully selected and seamlessly integrated to provide compelling support for the analysis, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of the text.
Analysis is absent or demonstrates a complete misunderstanding of the source material.
Analysis is superficial and lacks depth, providing minimal insight into the source material.
Analysis is present but underdeveloped, offering limited insight into the source material.
Analysis demonstrates a reasonable understanding of the source material, providing some insight into its meaning and significance.
Analysis is insightful and well-reasoned, demonstrating a strong understanding of the source material and its implications.
Analysis is sophisticated and insightful, demonstrating a deep understanding of the source material, its complexities, and its broader significance.
No connection is made between the textual evidence and an understanding of the text as a whole.
Connection to the text as a whole is weak and unclear.
A superficial connection is made between the textual evidence and the overall text.
Connection between specific details and the understanding of the text as a whole is evident.
Clear and logical connection is made between specific details and an insightful understanding of the text as a whole.
Compelling and insightful connection is made between specific details and a comprehensive understanding of the text, revealing a deep appreciation for its complexities.
